content:

title: PROJECTS
content:
School of Computer Science and Engineering Beihang UniversityMultifunctional Movie Website Sept. 2021 â€“ Dec. 2021GitHub

Developed a website for watching movies, deployed it on my private cloud server already
Click here to visit, Account:123, Password:123 for tourist
Used Vue and Django frame to build the front and back end respectively, and chose MySQL as database
Built E-R Diagram to design tables which met the requirement of 3NF for a trade-off between stability and efficiency
Improved the security of website via anti-injection of database and ciphertext of password storage

SysY-based Compiler Sept. 2021 â€“ Dec. 2021GitHub

Built a compiler using Java, which can transform SysY (a subset of C) from source code to MIPS assembly code
Included modules of Lexical Analysis (Automata Theory-based), Syntax Analysis (Recursive Descent-based), Semantic Analysis (Abstract Syntax Tree-based), Middle Code Generation (Quaternary Formula-based), Target Code Generation (MIPS-based)
Optimized the compiler via Inline Function, Loop Optimization, Register Allocation Optimization, among others; ranked 24 / 250 finally

ARC-based Page Replacement May. 2021 â€“ June. 2021GitHub

Simulated the page replacement of cache in operating system, and used Adaptive Replacement Cache (ARC) algorithm to decrease miss rate, which considered both recency and frequency, with adaptivity to the current memory access mode by adjusting capacity of cache for both dynamically
Built data structure with specific function and low memory usage from scratch rather than using STL container
Ranked 1/250 (according to the weighted result of perf instruction on Linux operating system)

MIPS-based Operating System Kernel Mar. 2021 â€“ June. 2021
Built a MIPS-based operating system kernel via Linux platform, using C programming language
Supported memory management, virtual address, interruption handling, inter-process switch and communication, disk management, file system and IO operation of device

Elevator System Simulator Mar. 2021 â€“ Apr. 2021GitHub

Used multithreading of Java to simulate the elevator system to deliver people to their target floor with the least time
Considered the load and number of elevators, used the LOOK scheduling algorithm for each individual elevator, and global transfer strategy to arrange all elevators to reach the least total of waiting time

Social Relationship System Mar. 2021 â€“ Apr. 2021GitHub

Developed a simple social relation simulator, supporting making groups, sending red envelopes and messages between users, querying the real-time status of the system, and managing kinds of exceptions

Built a debugging program to assure the correctness and real-time via black-box and white-box testing, and stress testing, respectively


MIPS-based CPU Oct. 2020 â€“ Jan. 2021GitHub

Implemented a CPU supporting five-stage pipelines (IF,ID,EX,MEM,WB) and interruption and exception handling
Supported 53 instructions totally in MIPS instruction set, where assembly instructions of C programs can be run

COVID-19 Reporter Feb. 2022 â€“ March. 2022GitHub

Built a auto reporter via Python
Used Charles to grasp the http package, then generated a fake one and sent it to the school server
Considered the accident, if report failed, an email sent by the reporter to my phone

Fire Alarm and Emergency Response System Sept. 2021 â€“ Dec. 2021GitHub

Implemented a IoT system with functions of sensing the ambient information (temperature and humidity),  presenting the history curve of it, controlling the alarm and threshold of alarm remotely, warning with LED flashing and buzzer working
Used Vue and Django to build the front and back end, MySQL to record the history information

Web Crawler Sept. 2020 â€“ Dec. 2020GitHub

Used Python to collect the movie information on Douban Top 250 Rank

Used IP proxy, random UA and referrer to make fake request_headers, carried out sleep to simulate real humans

Used PyQt5 lib to design the UI, separated the UI frame code and the logic code for better maintenance

Used B+ tree to accelerate the search process at local

title: RESEARCH
content:
Iâ€™ve done some research in CV, Robotics and Vision-and-language Navigation (VLN) fields.
Iâ€™m going to further explore CV, NLP and ML fields in the future.
Institue of Artificial Intelligence  Beihang University








Under the supervision of  Prof. Si Liu in  CoLab
VLN Model Optimization (May. 2022 â€“ Present)GitHub

Proposed the Structured state-Evolution (SEvol) module to solve the flaw of over-compression of object-level spatial-temporal information in NvEM, and enhanced the performance of it on R2R, R4R and REVERIE datasets
Based on A2C algorithm, used Reinforced Layout clues Miner (RLM) module to select objects appropriately
Employed Dynamic Graph Neural Network (DGNN) to aggregate the spatial-temporal information of objects
Based on GRU model, proposed mGRU model (matrix version), accomplished the renewal of weight in DGNN at every time step

Interactive Robotic Dog (Oct. 2021 â€“ May. 2022)GitHub

Built a robotic dog with the function of voice interaction and guiding the blind
Implemented object detection and speech recognition module based on YOLOv5 and CMUSphinx respectively
Implemented main control module based on SDK of motion and information generated by two modules mentioned

MybatisUtils
import org.apache.ibatis.io.Resources;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSession;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactory;
import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactoryBuilder;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStream;
public class MybatisUtils {
    private static SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory;
    static {
        try {
            String resource = "mybatis-config.xml";
            InputStream inputStream = Resources.getResourceAsStream(resource);
            sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(inputStream);
        } catch (IOException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
    //è·å–SqlSessionè¿æ¥
    public static SqlSession getSession(){
        return sqlSessionFactory.openSession();
    }
}

<mapper namespace="com.kuang.dao.UserMapper">

public class MyTest {
    @Test
    public void selectUser() {
        SqlSession session = MybatisUtils.getSession();
        UserMapper mapper = session.getMapper(UserMapper.class);
        List<User> users = mapper.selectUser();
        for (User user: users){
            System.out.println(user);
        }
        session.close();
    }
}

      <if test="crName != null">

    </set>
    where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
  </update>
  <update id="updateByPrimaryKey" parameterType="com.jd.kuplus.dashboard.entity.PodLifeCycle">
    update pod_life_cycle
    set pod_id = #{podId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      pod_name = #{podName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      namespace = #{namespace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      pod_status = #{podStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
      reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      log_path = #{logPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      submit_time = #{submitTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
      pending_time = #{pendingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
      start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
      finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
      node_name = #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      business_code = #{businessCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      limit_cpu = #{limitCpu,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
      limit_gpu = #{limitGpu,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
      limit_memory = #{limitMemory,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
      max_cpu = #{maxCpu,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
      max_gpu = #{maxGpu,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
      max_memory = #{maxMemory,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
      avg_cpu = #{avgCpu,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
      avg_gpu = #{avgGpu,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
      avg_memory = #{avgMemory,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
      del_status = #{delStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
      creator_erp = #{creatorErp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
      modified_erp = #{modifiedErp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      modified_date = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
      cr_type = #{crType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      cr_name = #{crName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      organization_code = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      resource_id = #{resourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
      gpu_type = #{gpuType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
    where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
  </update>

  </select>

  <select id="selectCrType" resultType="java.lang.String">

  <select id="selectNodeName" resultType="java.lang.String">

  </select>

  <select id="selectAllWithMultiCond" parameterType="com.jd.kuplus.dashboard.entity.SqlInfo" resultMap="BaseResultMap">
    select
    <include refid="Base_Column_List" />
    from pod_life_cycle
    <where>
      del_status = 0
      <if test="namespace != null">
        and
        <foreach item="item" index="index" collection="namespace"
                 open="namespace in (" separator="," close=")">
          #{item}
        </foreach>
      </if>
      <if test="crType != null">
        and
        <foreach item="item" index="index" collection="crType"
                 open="cr_type in (" separator="," close=")">
          #{item}
        </foreach>
      </if>
      <if test="nodeName != null">
        and
        <foreach item="item" index="index" collection="nodeName"
                 open="node_name in (" separator="," close=")">
          #{item}
        </foreach>
      </if>
      <if test="taskStatus != null">
        <choose>
          <when test="taskStatus == 0">
            and not exists (select * from reporter_record where pod_life_cycle.id = reporter_record.pod_life_cycle_id)
          </when>
          <when test="taskStatus == 1">
            and exists (select * from reporter_record where pod_life_cycle.id = reporter_record.pod_life_cycle_id and reporter_record.del_status = 0)
          </when>
          <otherwise>
            and exists (select * from reporter_record where pod_life_cycle.id = reporter_record.pod_life_cycle_id)
            and not exists (select * from reporter_record where pod_life_cycle.id = reporter_record.pod_life_cycle_id and reporter_record.del_status = 0)
          </otherwise>
        </choose>
      </if>
      <if test="podStatus != null">
        <choose>
          <when test="podStatus == 4">
            and pod_life_cycle.pod_status = 4 and pod_life_cycle.reason != 'Killed'
          </when>
          <when test="podStatus == 5">
            and pod_life_cycle.pod_status = 4 and pod_life_cycle.reason = 'Killed'
          </when>
          <otherwise>
            and pod_life_cycle.pod_status = #{podStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}
          </otherwise>
        </choose>
      </if>
      <if test="key != null">
        and (pod_name like '%${key}%' or cr_name like '%${key}%' or creator_erp like '%${key}%')
      </if>
    </where>
    order by submit_time desc
  </select>

title: INTERN
content:
ByteDance, Beijing









Back-end Intern of Master Data Department of Lark SuiteResponsible for data management (query, storage and transfer) and participated in three important projects as below:
Message Deduplication of the ETL Module
Combined the messages with same content in the Message Queue of ETL module, which reduced the pressure of query interfaces of Vault Service
Chose distribution architecture based on Partition Key of RocketMQ rather than centralized architecture based on Redis, to avoid complex and inefficient lock operation and consideration
Changed the offset of RocketMQ to the one before fault for disaster recovery, which assured the consistency of data and no messages loss

Optimization of Data Table Design
Changed the manage_relations table which has been put into use into job_data table, because of the poor performance on both function and efficiency of the former one, due to the imperfect design before
Kept two tables working simultaneously using double-write strategy to avoid data loss and pollution
Wrote Go script to assure the correctness of combination and storage of data
Increased the rate of flow online slowly, which prevented huge online fault during the table-change process

MultiGeo Function of Vault Service
Transferred the sensitive information of Singapore employee from China to Singapore, due to the legal requirements
Used the strategy of soft deletion followed by a hard deletion, which avoided data loss in transfer process
Added the support for cross-region storage and cross-region query for Vault Service

JD.com, Beijing









Back-end Development Engineer of Technology and Product Innovation Department of JD TechnologyParticipated in the development of Ku+ AI platform, a software based on AutoML and MLOps, designed for enterprise-level AI research
OSS Data Transfer
Built a Java script to flatten the file tree in OSS(Object Storage Service), wrote the results into MySQL database as persistent management via mybatis
Guaranteed the data consistency via transaction mechanism

Dept Tree Generator
Deployed a scheduled task to generate department Tree everyday
Used incremental-processing strategy, assuring the efficiency of scheduled task
Considered all departmental adjustments, carried out black and white box test

Exceptional Pod Reporter and Dashboard
Built a reporter to monitor the health conditions of pod, then sent exception details to pod owner and system administrator;a exceptional task dashboard, showing exceptional information of pod, including the status and description from Kubernetes
Added dynamic configuration function, supporting hot-swap the monitor rules (via mybatis dynamic SQL) and message receiver
Used cache layer (redis) to speed up the back-end query interface

Model Deployment Service
Developed the online deployment service, made the algorithm model as a RESTful API, holding the computing resources to assure the real-time capability
Built the offline deployment service to process the offline data, then wrote the results back into MySQL

Computing Resources Scheduler
Built a computing resources scheduler based on Docker and Kubernetes to improve the availability of the resources
Implemented several scheduling strategies, including Binpack, Spread, Coscheduling, Gang scheduling

ç”Ÿæˆå™¨å’Œè¿­ä»£å™¨è¿­ä»£å™¨class Fib:
    def __init__(self, n):
        self.prev = 0
        self.cur = 1
        self.n = n
    def __iter__(self):
    	return self
    def __next__(self):
        if self.n > 0:
            value = self.cur
            self.cur = self.cur + self.prev
            self.prev = value
            self.n -= 1
            return value
    	else:
            raise StopIteration()

ç”Ÿæˆå™¨æœ¬è´¨æ˜¯è¿­ä»£å™¨
åœ¨ Python ä¸­è¿˜æœ‰ä¸€ç§å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç”¨å…³é”®å­— yield æ¥è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œè¿™ç§å‡½æ•°å«ç”Ÿæˆå™¨å‡½æ•° ï¼Œå‡½æ•°è¢«è°ƒç”¨æ—¶ä¼šè¿”å›ä¸€ ä¸ªç”Ÿæˆå™¨å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆå™¨æœ¬è´¨ä¸Šè¿˜æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¿­ä»£å™¨(iterable)ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç”¨åœ¨è¿­ä»£æ“ä½œä¸­ï¼Œå› æ­¤å®ƒæœ‰å’Œè¿­ä»£å™¨ä¸€æ ·çš„ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œå”¯ ä¸€çš„åŒºåˆ«åœ¨äºå®ç°æ–¹å¼ä¸Šä¸ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œåè€…æ›´åŠ ç®€æ´
def fib(n):
    prev, curr = 0, 1
    while n > 0:
        n -= 1
        yield curr
        prev, curr = curr, curr + prev
print([i for i in fib(10)])

ç±»class heap(object):
    #æ‹¬å·é‡Œå¯ä»¥å¡«å†™è¦ç»§æ‰¿çš„çˆ¶ç±» pythonè¯­æ³•ä¸Šæ”¯æŒå¤šç»§æ‰¿
    #pythonç±»å±æ€§çš„å¼•ç”¨éƒ½éœ€è¦å¸¦ä¸Šself
    '''mode == 0 means little heap mode == 1 means big heap'''
    def __init__(self,heap,mode):
        self.__heap = []
        self.__mode = mode
        for element in heap:
            self.push(element)

    def get_size(self):
        return len(self.__heap)

    def get_top(self):
        if not heap:
            raise IndexError()
        return self.__heap[0]

    def push(self,element):
        p = self.get_size()
        self.__heap.append(element)
        if self.__mode == 0:
            while p != 0 and self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2] > self.__heap[p]:
                self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2]
                p = (p - 1) // 2
        else:
            while p != 0 and self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2] < self.__heap[p]:
                self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2]
                p = (p - 1) // 2
        ##up

    def pop(self):
        p = self.get_size() - 1
        self.__heap[0],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[0]
        top = self.__heap.pop()
        p = 0
        size = self.get_size()
        if self.__mode == 0:
            while p * 2 + 1 < size and p * 2 + 2 < size:
                if self.__heap[p] <= self.__heap[p * 2 + 1] and self.__heap[p] <= self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]:
                    return top
                elif self.__heap[p * 2 + 1] < self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]:
                        self.__heap[p * 2 + 1],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]
                        p = p * 2 + 1
                else:
                    self.__heap[p * 2 + 2],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]
                    p = p * 2 + 2
            if p * 2 + 1 < size and self.__heap[p] > self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]:
                self.__heap[p * 2 + 1], self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p], self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]
                ##down handle index out of range
        else:
            while p * 2 + 1 < size and p * 2 + 2 < size:
                if self.__heap[p] >= self.__heap[p * 2 + 1] and self.__heap[p] >= self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]:
                    return top
                elif self.__heap[p * 2 + 1] > self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]:
                        self.__heap[p * 2 + 1],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]
                        p = p * 2 + 1
                else:
                    self.__heap[p * 2 + 2],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]
                    p = p * 2 + 2
            if p * 2 + 1 < size and self.__heap[p] < self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]:
                self.__heap[p * 2 + 1], self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p], self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]
                #down handle index out of range
        return top

def reverseList(self, head):
    prev = None
    while head:
        head.next, prev, head = prev, head, head.next
    return prev

æºç 
def bisect_left(a, x, lo=0, hi=None):
    """Return the index where to insert item x in list a, assuming a is sorted.

    The return value i is such that 
    
    all e in a[:i] have e < x, and all e in
    a[i:] have e >= x.  
    
    So if x already appears in the list, a.insert(x) will
    insert just before the leftmost x already there.

    Optional args lo (default 0) and hi (default len(a)) bound the
    slice of a to be searched.
    """

    if lo < 0:
        raise ValueError('lo must be non-negative')
    if hi is None:
        hi = len(a)
    while lo < hi:
        mid = (lo+hi)//2
        if a[mid] < x: lo = mid+1
        else: hi = mid
    return lo

class heap(object):
    '''mode == 0 means little heap mode == 1 means big heap'''
    def __init__(self,heap,mode):
        self.__heap = []
        self.__mode = mode
        for element in heap:
            self.push(element)

    def get_size(self):
        return len(self.__heap)

    def get_top(self):
        if not heap:
            raise IndexError()
        return self.__heap[0]

    def push(self,element):
        p = self.get_size()
        self.__heap.append(element)
        if self.__mode == 0:
            while p != 0 and self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2] > self.__heap[p]:
                self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2]
                p = (p - 1) // 2
        else:
            while p != 0 and self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2] < self.__heap[p]:
                self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[(p - 1) // 2]
                p = (p - 1) // 2
        ##up

    def pop(self):
        p = self.get_size() - 1
        self.__heap[0],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[0]
        top = self.__heap.pop()
        p = 0
        size = self.get_size()
        if self.__mode == 0:
            while p * 2 + 1 < size and p * 2 + 2 < size:
                if self.__heap[p] <= self.__heap[p * 2 + 1] and self.__heap[p] <= self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]:
                    return top
                elif self.__heap[p * 2 + 1] < self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]:
                        self.__heap[p * 2 + 1],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]
                        p = p * 2 + 1
                else:
                    self.__heap[p * 2 + 2],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]
                    p = p * 2 + 2
            if p * 2 + 1 < size and self.__heap[p] > self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]:
                self.__heap[p * 2 + 1], self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p], self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]
                ##down handle index out of range
        else:
            while p * 2 + 1 < size and p * 2 + 2 < size:
                if self.__heap[p] >= self.__heap[p * 2 + 1] and self.__heap[p] >= self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]:
                    return top
                elif self.__heap[p * 2 + 1] > self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]:
                        self.__heap[p * 2 + 1],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]
                        p = p * 2 + 1
                else:
                    self.__heap[p * 2 + 2],self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p],self.__heap[p * 2 + 2]
                    p = p * 2 + 2
            if p * 2 + 1 < size and self.__heap[p] < self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]:
                self.__heap[p * 2 + 1], self.__heap[p] = self.__heap[p], self.__heap[p * 2 + 1]
                #down handle index out of range
        return top

4.äºŒå‰æ ‘é€’å½’åªæ¶‰åŠåˆ°ä¸‰æ¡è¯­å¥ å‰ä¸­ååºéå†åªæ¶‰åŠåˆ°è¯­å¥çš„ä¸åŒä½ç½®
é€’å½’å®ç°public List<Integer> preorderTraversal(TreeNode root) {
    ArrayList<Integer> results = new ArrayList<>();
    if (root == null) {
        return results;
    }
    results.add(root.val);
    results.addAll(preorderTraversal(root.left));
    results.addAll(preorderTraversal(root.right));
    return results;
}
	
public List<Integer> inorderTraversal(TreeNode root) {
    ArrayList<Integer> results = new ArrayList<>();
    if (root == null) {
        return results;
    }
    results.addAll(inorderTraversal(root.left));
    results.add(root.val);
    results.addAll(inorderTraversal(root.right));
    return results;
}

public List<Integer> postorderTraversal(TreeNode root) {
    ArrayList<Integer> results = new ArrayList<>();
    if (root == null) {
        return results;
    }
    results.addAll(postorderTraversal(root.left));
    results.addAll(postorderTraversal(root.right));
    results.add(root.val);
    return results;
}

public List<Integer> preorderTraversal(TreeNode root) {
       List<Integer> ans = new ArrayList<>();
       Stack<TreeNode> stack = new Stack<>();
       TreeNode cur = root;
       while (cur != null || !stack.isEmpty()) {
           while (cur != null) {
               ans.add(cur.val);
               stack.push(cur);
               cur = cur.left;
           }
           cur = stack.pop();
           cur = cur.right;
       }
       return ans;
   }

   //è¿­ä»£ä¸­åº
public List<Integer> inorderTraversal(TreeNode root) {
       List<Integer> ans = new ArrayList<>();
       Stack<TreeNode> stack = new Stack<>();
       TreeNode cur = root;
       while (cur != null || !stack.isEmpty()) {
           while (cur != null) {
               stack.push(cur);
               cur = cur.left;
           }
           cur = stack.pop();
           ans.add(cur.val);
           cur = cur.right;
       }
       return ans;
   }

   public List<Integer> postorderTraversal(TreeNode root) {
       TreeNode cur = root;
       Stack<TreeNode> stack = new Stack<>();
       List<Integer> ans = new ArrayList<>();
       while (cur != null || !stack.isEmpty()) {
           while (cur != null) {
               stack.push(cur);
               if (cur.left != null) {
                   cur = cur.left;
               } else {
                   cur = cur.right;
               }
           }
           cur = stack.pop();
           //è¯´æ˜è¿™ä¸ªnodeçš„å·¦å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹éƒ½æ˜¯null ç›´æ¥visit
           ans.add(cur.val);
           //è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯ä¸Šä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å·¦èŠ‚ç‚¹
           if (!stack.isEmpty() && stack.peek().left == cur) {
               //è¯´æ˜å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹æ˜¯ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å·¦å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸èƒ½å¼¹å‡º
               cur = stack.peek().right;
           } else {
               //è¿™é‡Œå…¶å®å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥popä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹
               //èµ‹null ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ å°±æ˜¯å¤šèµ°ä¸€æ¬¡å¾ªç¯
               cur = null;
           }
       }
       return ans;
   }

class Solution {
public:
    int strStr(string haystack, string needle) {
        //KMPç®—æ³•
        //é¦–å…ˆè®¡ç®—next
        int n = haystack.length(), m = needle.length();
        //æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œä¸èƒ½ç›´æ¥åˆå§‹åŒ– cppç¼–è¯‘ä¸è¿‡
        int next[m];
        for (int i = 0; i < m; ++i) {
            next[i] = 0;
        }
        int j = 0;
        for (int i = 1; i < m; ++i) {
            //åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’æ‰¾å‰ç¼€
            if (j > 0 && needle[i] != needle[j]) {
                j = next[j - 1];
            }
            //jå®é™…ä¸Šä¹Ÿç­‰äºå‰ç¼€é•¿åº¦
            if (needle[i] == needle[j]) {
                j++;
            }
            next[i] = j;
        }
        //å¼€å§‹åŒ¹é…
        int i = 0;
        j = 0;
        while (i < n) {
            if (haystack[i] == needle[j]) {
                i++;
                j++;
            } else if (j > 0) {
                //å¦‚æœä¸ç­‰ jè¦å»å“ªï¼Ÿ ç”±nextæ•°ç»„å‘ŠçŸ¥ å®é™…ä¸Šnextä¸­å¯¸çš„å°±æ˜¯å½“å‰ä½ç½®ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬ï¼‰çš„æœ€é•¿å‰åç¼€
                j = next[j - 1];
            } else {
                //j == 0è¯´æ˜é€€ä¸äº†äº† åªèƒ½iè¿›åˆ°ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ª
                i++;
            }
            //åªæœ‰j++çš„æ—¶å€™æœ‰ç”¨
            if (j == m) {
                return i - j;
            }
        }
        return -1;
    }
};

//æ”¶ç¼©ä¸Šç•Œ lowerbound æ‰¾targetè¯¥æ’å…¥çš„å¤´éƒ¨ä½ç½® ï¼ˆæœ€å·¦ä¾§ï¼‰
class Solution {
    public int searchInsert(int[] nums, int target) {
        //è¿­ä»£æ³• [a,b) && æ”¶ç¼©ä¸Šç•Œ
        int left = 0;
        int right = nums.length;
        while (left < right) {
            int mid = left + ((right - left) >> 1);
            //ç­‰äºçš„æ—¶å€™ä¸è¦ç€æ€¥è¿”å›ï¼ å°†ä¸Šç•Œå‘ä¸‹æ”¶ç¼©
            if (nums[mid] >= target) {
                right = mid;
            } else {
                left = mid + 1;
            }
        }
        return left;
    }
}
//æ”¶ç¼©ä¸‹ç•Œ
//1æ‰¾ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå¤§äºtargetçš„index ï¼ˆæœ«å°¾çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæœ€å³ä¾§ï¼‰
class Solution {
    public int searchInsert(int[] nums, int target) {
        //è¿­ä»£æ³• [a,b) && æ”¶ç¼©ä¸‹ç•Œ
        int left = 0;
        int right = nums.length;
        while (left < right) {
            int mid = left + ((right - left) >> 1);
            if (nums[mid] > target) {
                right = mid;
            } else {
                //ç­‰äºçš„æ—¶å€™ä¸è¦åå›ï¼ å°†ä¸‹ç•Œå‘ä¸Šæ”¶ç¼©
                left = mid + 1;
            }
        }
        return left;
    }
}
//2æ‰¾targetè¯¥æ’å…¥çš„æœ«å°¾ä½ç½®
class Solution {
    public int searchInsert(int[] nums, int target) {
        //è¿­ä»£æ³• [a,b) && æ”¶ç¼©ä¸‹ç•Œ
        int left = 0;
        int right = nums.length;
        while (left < right) {
            int mid = left + ((right - left) >> 1);
            if (nums[mid] > target) {
                right = mid;
            } else {
                left = mid + 1;
            }
        }
        return left - 1;
    }
}

public class BinarySearch {
    //è¿­ä»£é€’å½’çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦éƒ½æ˜¯O(logn)
    //é€’å½’çš„ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸ºO(logn) è¿­ä»£ä¸ºO(1)
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[] array = new int[]{1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5, 6};
        class Search {
            //[l,r)
            public int searchIndexIter(int[] array, int l, int r, int tar) {
                int mid;
                while (l < r) {
                    mid = l + ((r - l) >> 1);
                    if (array[mid] >= tar) {
                        r = mid;
                    } else {
                        // arrya[mid] < tar
                        //at least mid + 1
                        l = mid + 1;
                    }
                }
                return l;
            }

            public int searchIndexRec(int[] array, int l, int r, int tar) {
                if (l >= r) {
                    return l;
                }
                int mid = l + ((r - l) >> 1);
                if (array[mid] >= tar) {
                    return searchIndexRec(array, l, mid, tar);
                } else {
                    return searchIndexRec(array,mid + 1,r,tar);
                }
            }
        }
        Search search = new Search();
        int ans = search.searchIndexIter(array,0,array.length,5);
        System.out.println(ans);
        ans = search.searchIndexRec(array, 0, array.length, 4);
        System.out.println(ans);
    }
}

public class BubbleSort {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[] array = new int[]{1, 2, 2,4, 5,5,7,7 , 67,3};
        class Sort {
            public void bubbleSort(int[] array) {
                for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
                    boolean changed = false;
                    for (int j = 0; j < array.length - i - 1; j++) {
                        //åƒä¸‡æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œjçš„æ¡ä»¶
                        if (array[j] > array[j + 1]) {
                            int tmp = array[j];
                            array[j] = array[j + 1];
                            array[j + 1] = tmp;
                            changed = true;
                        }
                    }
                    if (!changed) {
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        Sort s = new Sort();
        s.bubbleSort(array);
        for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
            System.out.println(array[i]);
        }
    }
}

public class SelectionSort {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[] nums = {3,5,1,2,3,6,5};
        chooseSort(nums);
        for (int num:nums) {
            System.out.println(num);
        }
    }

    public static void chooseSort(int[] nums) {
        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {
            int max = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
            int maxIndex = -1;
            for (int j = 0; j < nums.length - i; j++) {
                if (nums[j] >= max) {
                    max = nums[j];
                    maxIndex = j;
                }
            }
            nums[maxIndex] = nums[nums.length - i - 1];
            nums[nums.length - i - 1] = max;
        }
    }
}

public class InsertionSort {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[] array = new int[]{1, 2, 2,4, 5,5,7,7 , 67,3};
        insertionSort(array);
        for (int num : array) {
            System.out.println(num);
        }
    }

    public static void insertionSort(int[] nums) {
        for (int i = 1; i < nums.length; i++) {
            for (int j = i; j >= 0; j--) {
                if (nums[j] < nums[j - 1]) {
                    //æ¯”å‰é¢çš„å° è¦å¾€å‰æŒª
                    int tmp = nums[j - 1];
                    nums[j - 1] = nums[j];
                    nums[j] = tmp;
                } else {
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

public class MergeSort {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[] nums = {3,5,1,2,3,6,5};
        mergerSort(nums,0, nums.length - 1);
        for (int num:nums) {
            System.out.println(num);
        }
    }

    public static void mergerSort(int[] nums, int i, int j) {
        if (i >= j) {
            return;
        }
        int mid = i + ((j - i) >> 1);
        mergerSort(nums, i, mid);
        mergerSort(nums, mid + 1, j);
        merge(nums, i, mid, j);
    }

    public static void merge(int[] nums, int i, int mid, int j) {
        int[] tmp = nums.clone();
        int p1 = i;
        int p2 = mid + 1;
        int k = i;
        while (p1 <= mid && p2 <= j) {
            if (tmp[p1] < tmp[p2]) {
                nums[k++] = tmp[p1++];
            } else {
                nums[k++] = tmp[p2++];
            }
        }
        while (p1 <= mid) {
            nums[k++] = tmp[p1++];
        }
        while (p2 <= j) {
            nums[k++] = tmp[p2++];
        }
    }
}

public class QuickSort {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[] array = new int[]{1, 2, 2,4, 5,5,7,7 , 67,3};
        class Sort {
            public int partition(int[] array,int l,int r) {
                int pivot = array[r];
                int i = l;
                int j = r;
                while (i < j) {
                    while (array[i] < pivot) {
                        i++;
                    }
                    array[j] = array[i];
                    while (array[j] >= pivot) {
                        //åƒä¸‡æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œè¦å†™ç­‰å·ä¸ç„¶ä¸¤è¾¹æ²¡æ³•é æ‹¢
                        j--;
                    }
                    array[i] = array[j];
                }
                array[i] = pivot;
                return i;
            }

            public void quickSortRec(int[] array,int l,int r) {
                if (l >= r) {
                    return;
                }
                int mid = partition(array, l,r);
                quickSortRec(array, l, mid - 1);
                quickSortRec(array, mid + 1, r);
            }

            public void quickSortIter(int[] array,int l,int r) {
                Stack<int[]> stack = new Stack<>();//ç”¨æ ˆæ¨¡æ‹Ÿ é€’å½’æ‹†åˆ†
                stack.push(new int[] {l,r});
                while (!stack.isEmpty()) {
                    int[] range = stack.pop();//[l,r]
                    if (range[0] >= range[1]) {
                        continue;
                    } else {
                        int index = partition(array, range[0],range[1]);
                        stack.push(new int[]{range[0], index - 1});
                        stack.push(new int[]{index + 1, range[1]});
                    }
                }
            }
        }
        Sort s = new Sort();
//        s.quickSortRec(array,0,array.length - 1);
//        for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
//            System.out.println(array[i]);
//        }
        s.quickSortIter(array,0,array.length - 1);
        for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
            System.out.println(array[i]);
        }
    }
}

public class CountingSort {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[] array = new int[]{1, 2, 2,4, 5,5,7,7 , 67,3};
        array = countingSort(array);
        for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
            System.out.println(array[i]);
        }
    }

    public static int[] countingSort(int[] nums) {
        //å…ˆæ‰¾æœ€å¤§çš„æ•° å†³å®šcountæ•°ç»„çš„å¤§å°
        int k = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
        for (int num : nums) {
            if (num > k) {
                k = num;
            }
        }
        int[] count = new int[k];
        for (int num : nums) {
            count[num - 1] += 1;
        }
        for (int i = 1; i < k; i++) {
            count[i] += count[i - 1];
        }
        //æ³¨æ„è¿™é‡Œçš„countåŒ…æ‹¬æœ¬èº« æ¯”å¦‚å¦‚æœæŸä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¯¹åº”çš„countæ˜¯4 é‚£ä¹ˆè¡¨ç¤ºå‰é¢æœ‰3ä¸ªå…ƒç´ æ¯”4å¤§
        int[] ans = new int[nums.length];
        for (int i = nums.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
            ans[count[nums[i] - 1] - 1] = nums[i];
            count[nums[i] - 1] -= 1;
        }
        return ans;
    }
}

3.shellå¢é‡ä¸€å±‚while æ’å…¥æ’åºå®ç°èµ·å§‹ç‚¹ä¸€å±‚for ç»ˆç‚¹ä¸€å±‚while
public class ShellSort {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[] array = {3, 5, 1, 2, 3, 6, 5};
        shellSort(array);
        Arrays.stream(array).forEach(System.out::println);
    }

    public static void shellSort(int[] array) {
        //shell å¢é‡
        //åˆå§‹å¸Œå°”å¢é‡å–n / 2
        int shell = array.length / 2;
        while (shell > 0) {
            //æ’å…¥æ’åºå®ç°
            for (int i = shell; i < array.length; i += shell) {
                for (int j = i; j > 0; j -= shell) {
                    if (array[j] < array[j - shell]) {
                        int tmp = array[j - shell];
                        array[j - shell] = array[j];
                        array[j] = tmp;
                    } else {
                        break;
                    }
                }
            }
            //æ›´æ–°shell å¢é‡
            shell /= 2;
        }
    }
}

public class HeapSort {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[] array = {3, 5, 1, 2, 3, 6, 5};
        array = heapSort(array);
        Arrays.stream(array).forEach(System.out::println);
    }

    static class Heap {
        //å°é¡¶å † æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹<=å·¦å³å­èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å€¼
        private List<Integer> array = new ArrayList<>();

        public void insert(int element) {
            //æ”¾å…¥æœ«å°¾
            array.add(element);
            //ä¸æ–­ä¸Šæµ®
            int index = array.size() - 1;
            while (index > 0) {
                int parentIndex = (index - 1) / 2;
                if (array.get(parentIndex) > array.get(index)) {
                    //swap
                    swap(parentIndex, index);
                }
                index = parentIndex;
            }
        }

        public void removeTop() {
            //äº¤æ¢é¦–æœ«
            swap(0, array.size() - 1);
            //ç§»é™¤
            array.remove(array.size() - 1);
            //ä¸æ–­ä¸‹æ²‰
            int index = 0;
            int left = index * 2 + 1;
            int right = index * 2 + 2;
            while (true) {
                //è¦ä¹ˆæ¯”å·¦èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤§ è¦ä¹ˆæ¯”å³èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤§ å¦åˆ™è¯´æ˜å·²ç»ç¬¦åˆå°é¡¶å †è¦æ±‚
                if (left < array.size() && array.get(index) > array.get(left)) {
                    swap(index, left);
                    index = left;
                } else if (right < array.size() && array.get(index) > array.get(right)) {
                    swap(index, right);
                    index = right;
                } else {
                    break;
                }
                left = index * 2 + 1;
                right = index * 2 + 2;
            }
        }

        public int top() {
            if (array.size() > 0) {
                return array.get(0);
            } else {
                return -Integer.MIN_VALUE;
            }
        }

        private void swap(int index1, int index2) {
            int tmp = array.get(index1);
            array.set(index1, array.get(index2));
            array.set(index2, tmp);
        }
    }

    public static int[] heapSort(int[] array) {
        Heap heap = new Heap();
        //å»ºå †
        for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
            heap.insert(array[i]);
        }
        int[] ans = new int[array.length];
        for (int i = 0; i < ans.length; i++) {
            ans[i] = heap.top();
            heap.removeTop();
        }
        return ans;
    }
}

public class RadixSort {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[] array = {1, 2, 2,4, 5,5,7,7 , 67,3};
        array = radixSort(array);
        Arrays.stream(array).forEach(System.out::println);
    }

    public static int[] radixSort(int[] array) {
        //åˆå§‹åŒ–radix
        List<List<Integer>> radix = new ArrayList<>();
        int k = 10;
        for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {
            radix.add(new ArrayList<>());
        }
        //æ‰¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§çš„ä½æ•°
        int max = Arrays.stream(array).reduce(Integer.MIN_VALUE, Integer::max);
        //æ”¶é›†è½®æ•°
        int t = String.valueOf(max).length();
        int divisor = 1;
        //int[] -> List
        List<Integer> ans = Arrays.stream(array).boxed().collect(Collectors.toList());
        for (int i = 0; i < t; i++) {
            divisor *= 10;
            //æŠ•å…¥
            for (int j = 0; j < ans.size(); j++) {
                radix.get(ans.get(j) % divisor).add(ans.get(j));
            }
            //æ¸…ç©º
            ans = new ArrayList<>();
            //æ”¶é›†
            for (int j = 0; j < radix.size(); j++) {
                ans.addAll(radix.get(j));
            }
            t--;
        }
        //List -> int[]
        return ans.stream().mapToInt(Integer::intValue).toArray();
    }
}



æ¡¶æ’åº1.ä½¿ç”¨æ˜ å°„å°†Nä¸ªæ•°åˆ†åˆ°Kä¸ªæœ‰åºæ¡¶ä¸­
2.æ¯ä¸ªæ¡¶å„è‡ªæ’åº
æ¡¶æ’åºæ˜¯ä¸€ç§æ€æƒ³ åˆ†æ¡¶ä¹‹åï¼Œæ¯ä¸ªæ¡¶é‡Œçš„æ’åºæ–¹æ³•å¯ä»¥ä»»é€‰
public class BucketSort {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        int[] array = {3, 5, 1, 2, 3, 6, 5};
        array = bucketSort(array);
        Arrays.stream(array).forEach(System.out::println);
    }

    public static int[] bucketSort(int[] array) {
        //æ¡¶åºå·2å…ƒç´ 
        HashMap<Integer, List<Integer>> buckets = new HashMap<>();
        //æ¡¶å¤§å°
        int bucketSize = 10;
        //å…¥æ¡¶
        for (int i = 0; i < array.length; i++) {
            //æ¡¶åºå·
            int index = 0;
            //æ­£è´Ÿå…ƒç´ è®¡ç®—æ¡¶åºå·çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸åŒ
            if (array[i] >= 0) {
                index = array[i] / bucketSize;
            } else {
                index = (array[i] + 1) / bucketSize - 1;
            }
            if (buckets.containsKey(index)) {
                buckets.get(index).add(array[i]);
            } else {
                List<Integer> bucket = new ArrayList<>();
                bucket.add(array[i]);
                buckets.put(index, bucket);
            }
        }
        //å¯¹æ¯ä¸ªæ¡¶æ’åº
        //ä¸ºäº†ä¿è¯æ¡¶çš„é¡ºåº
        List<Integer> keyOrder = new ArrayList<>();
        Iterator iterator = buckets.entrySet().iterator();
        while (iterator.hasNext()) {
            Map.Entry<Integer, List<Integer>> entry = (Map.Entry<Integer, List<Integer>>) iterator.next();
            keyOrder.add(entry.getKey());
            //å¯¹bucketè¿›è¡Œæ’åº
            entry.getValue().sort(Comparator.comparing(Integer::intValue));
        }
        keyOrder.sort(Comparator.comparing(Integer::intValue));
        List<Integer> ans = new ArrayList<>();
        for (int i = 0; i < keyOrder.size(); i++) {
            int key = keyOrder.get(i);
            ans.addAll(buckets.get(key));
        }
        return ans.stream().mapToInt(Integer::intValue).toArray();
    }
}
